department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: slightly abstracted image of seated Native American man holding on his lap a black and tan stripe white pipe with a bag with tan and black geometric designs; man wears a long-sleeved shirt with pointed front hem, blue pants and striped moccasins; blue background

title: Another Deco Indian
